text: Attitudes is Lorie's third studio album, and her fourth album overall. It has a self-admitted rockier sound than the singer's first two records and was released on 19 January 2004 in two versions: a regular, jewel case release and a limited edition digipak also containing a DVD and six stickers featuring the best-selling singing star. The album sold more than 350, 000 in Europe alone. ==Track listing== ===CD=== # "Intro" – 0:55 # "Week End" – 4:02 # "Ensorcelée" – 3:57 # "Sur la scène" – 4:17 # "En regardant la mer" – 3:51 # "Baggy, bandana et poésie" – 4:10 # "La positive attitude" – 4:31 # "C'est plus fort que moi" – 3:49 # "Si tu revenais" – 4:21 # "Ma bonne étoile" – 4:33 # "Le temps de partir" – 3:25 # "C'est fini" – 4:07 # "Au delà des frontières" – 5:11 ===DVD (limited edition release only)=== # "Week End" (music video) – 4:02 # "Week End" (karaoke) – 4:02 # "Week End" (making of) – 26:00 ==Certifications== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
